name: Feature Subsetting
title: Feature Subsetting
description: Subset data using a given feature.
author: Gauhar Bains (gauhar.bains@labshare.org) and Hamdah Shafqat Abbasi (hamdahshafqat.abbasi@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

tabularDir.title: Input tabular directory
tabularDir.description: Path to directory containing tabular data.

filePattern.title: Filename pattern
filePattern.description: Filename pattern used to separate data.

imageFeature.title: imageFeature
imageFeature.description: Feature in tabular data containing image filenames.

tabularFeature.title: tabularFeature
tabularFeature.description: Feature in tabular data to subset image data.

padding.title: padding
padding.description: Number of images to capture outside the cutoff.

groupVar.title: groupVar
groupVar.description: variables to group by in a section.

removeDirection.title: removeDirection
removeDirection.description: Remove direction above or below percentile.

writeOutput.title: writeOutput
writeOutput.description: Write output image collection or not.
